subject: ARE YOU AWARE OF THIS INSTRUCT
body:
ARE YOU AWARE OF THIS INSTRUCTION TO CREDIT YOUR SUM OF $4.5MILLIONUSD
TO MRS. RACHELL.????????.
We recieved an email from one Mrs.Rachell Bordoy who presented a
telephone number with a resident address, saying that you gave her the
power of attorney to make your claims of $4.5MILLION USD and we have
stop order instruction on the funds pending when your views and
comments are received with regards to this matter. Please try and get
back to us immediately you got this email message sent to you before
we instruct her to pay for the required charges involved and have the
$4.5MILLION USD released to her immediately.
Below is the informations she sent to us now.
Name: Mrs.Rachell Bordoy
Address: 80 west 170st, apt c4 Bronx, Ny 10452.
Your urgent response will be highly appreciated. Feel free to contact
us if you have any queries immediately.Email;
morganmrschinyere@gmail.com
 HOPE TO HEAR FROM YOU ASAP.
MRS CHINYERE MORGAN

subject: Re: ARE YOU AWARE OF THIS INSTRUCT
body:
Hello Mrs. Chinyere Morgan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware of any sum being credited to my name. Could you please provide more details about this? How did this come about and what exactly does it entail?

Also, regarding the person named Bordoy who claims to have power of attorney over my supposed claims, I don't recall giving anyone such authority. Could you tell me more about her? How did she get involved in this matter?

I'm looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kim
